text.value: Meat (beef, goat, lamb, chicken, duck) or Fish

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Patient must be under 12 years old

bind.calculate: floor( difference-in-months( /assessment/inputs/contact/date_of_birth , today() ) div 12 )
difference-in-months( /assessment/inputs/contact/date_of_birth , today() )
floor( decimal-date-time(today()) - decimal-date-time( /assessment/inputs/contact/date_of_birth ) )

concat( concat( /assessment/patient_age_in_years , if( /assessment/patient_age_in_years =1,' year and ',' years and ')), concat( /assessment/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /assessment/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' month old',' months old')) )
/assessment/group_fever/patient_temperature
if ( /assessment/group_cough/chest_indrawing ='yes', 'In-drawn chest', '')
if ( /assessment/group_breathing/fast_breathing = 'true', 'Fast breathing', '')
if( count-selected( /assessment/group_danger_signs/danger_signs ) > 0, 'Danger signs', '')
/assessment/group_danger_signs/danger_signs

if ((( /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough ='cough1' and /assessment/patient_age_in_years >= 2 and /assessment/patient_age_in_years < 6)) or ( /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough ='pneumonia1' and /assessment/patient_age_in_years <5) or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_diarrhea ='diarrhea1' or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_fever ='fever1' or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_fever ='malaria1', 'true', 'false' )

if ( /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough ='cough2' or ( /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough ='pneumonia1' and /assessment/patient_age_in_years >= 5) or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough ='cough3' or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough ='pneumonia2b' or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough ='pneumonia2c' or ( /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_diarrhea ='diarrhea1' and /assessment/patient_age_in_years >= 5) or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_diarrhea ='diarrhea2' or ( /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_fever ='fever1' and /assessment/patient_age_in_months < 3) or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_fever ='fever2' or ( /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_fever ='malaria1' and /assessment/patient_age_in_months < 4) or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_fever ='malaria2' or count-selected( /assessment/group_danger_signs/danger_signs ) > 0 or /assessment/patient_age_in_months < 2 or /assessment/patient_age_in_years >= 12, 'true', 'false' )

if ((( /assessment/patient_age_in_months >= 2 and /assessment/patient_age_in_months <=6) and ( /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/muac_score >= 11.5 and /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/muac_score <= 12.5) or ( /assessment/patient_age_in_months >= 2 and /assessment/patient_age_in_months <=6) and ( /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/muac_score >= 1.0 and /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/muac_score < 11.5)), 'true', 'false')

if ((( /assessment/patient_age_in_months > 6 and /assessment/patient_age_in_months <= 59) and ( /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/muac_score >= 11.5 and /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/muac_score <= 12.5) or ( /assessment/patient_age_in_months > 6 and /assessment/patient_age_in_months <= 59) and ( /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/muac_score >= 1.0 and /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/muac_score < 11.5)), 'true', 'false')

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Date can not be in the future
Breaths per minute must be between 10 and 85
'None' can not be selected in combination with other options
'None' can not be selected in combination with other options

bind.relevant: selected( /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/group_under_2yr/times_breastfed , '0') or selected( /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/group_under_2yr/times_breastfed , '1') or selected( /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/group_under_2yr/times_breastfed , '2') or selected( /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/group_under_2yr/times_breastfed , '3') or selected( /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/group_under_2yr/times_breastfed , '4')

bind.constraint: not((selected(., 'none') and count-selected(.) >=2) or (selected(., 'breast_milk') and (selected( /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/group_under_2yr/breastfeeding , 'no') or selected( /assessment/group_nutrition_assessment/group_under_2yr/breastfed_24hrs , 'no'))))

bind.relevant: /assessment/symptom_cough = '' and /assessment/symptom_indrawn_chest = '' and /assessment/symptom_fast_breathing = '' and /assessment/symptom_diarrhea = '' and /assessment/symptom_fever = '' and /assessment/symptom_malaria_test = '' and /assessment/symptom_danger_signs = ''

(( /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough ='pneumonia1' and /assessment/patient_age_in_years < 5) or ( /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough ='cough1' and /assessment/patient_age_in_years >= 2 and /assessment/patient_age_in_years < 6)) and selected( /assessment/group_breathing/pneumonia_treatment_given , 'yes')

( /assessment/patient_age_in_months >= 2 and /assessment/patient_age_in_months < 6) and ( /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough !='' or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_diarrhea !='' or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_fever !='' or count-selected( /assessment/group_danger_signs/danger_signs ) > 0)

( /assessment/patient_age_in_months >= 6 and /assessment/patient_age_in_years < 2) and ( /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_cough !='' or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_diarrhea !='' or /assessment/group_diagnosis/diagnosis_fever !='' or count-selected( /assessment/group_danger_signs/danger_signs ) > 0)

bind.calculate: concat('uuid:', uuid())

input.label: Refer child to health facility immediately

Message to caregiver: Breastfeed whenever the baby wants, both day and night so that they get enough milk. Be sure to empty one breast before switching to the other. Do not give other foods and drinks like water or juice

Message to caregiver: At 6 months, your child's body is ready to accept food and now needs food in addition to breast milk to get enough energy and nutrition. Begin offering mushy foods 2-3 times per day. Thick porridge made from millet, cassava, maize, soya or a packaged mix are a good first food.

Message to caregiver: Your child needs a good diet to grow well and prevent stunting and sickness. Feed your child a variety of foods many times a day. Continue breastfeeding as often as the child wants both day and night. Your baby still needs breast milk to grow well and fight disease

Message to caregiver: Your child needs food from 2 or 3 of the different types of foods at every meal. In addition to breast milk, ensure that your child also feeds on one of these as regularly as possible: meats, fish, chicken, eggs, or milk. These foods are especially important for your child's proper growth.

select1.label: In the last 24 hours, how many times has your child eaten any solid or semi-solid foods?

select.label: What did your child eat and drink in the last 24 hours? (tick all that apply as mentioned by client)

item.label: Meat (beef, goat, lamb, chicken, duck) or Fish

Message to caregiver: Your child needs food from 2 or 3 of the different types of foods at every meal. Ensure that your child feeds on one of these as regularly as possible: meats, fish, chicken, eggs, or milk. These foods are especially important for your child's proper growth.

Refer to health facility for treatment: Child has Severe Acute Malnutrition (SAM). Follow up after 24 hours
Refer to health facility for treatment: Child has Severe Acute Malnutrition (SAM). Follow up after 48 hours
Diagnosis & Treatment
Cough
Pneumonia
No pneumonia treatment given
Treat with Cough Syrup

5 ml
3 times a day
For 5 days

10 ml
3 times a day
For 3 days
Treat with Amoxicillin

1 tab (250mg each)
2 times a day
For 5 days
Total of 10 tablets

2 tablets (250mg each)
2 times a day
For 5 days
Total of 20 tablets
Special Instructions
No treatment needed right now. Remind the caregiver to go to a health facility if cough persists for more than 2 weeks or if child becomes more ill.

Help the caregiver give the first dose now. Refer to a health facility if symptoms persist.

Remind the caregiver to give the full course of medication to the child.

Help the caregiver give the first dose now. Refer to a health facility.

Remind the caregiver to give the full course of medication to the child.
The child likely has pneumonia. Advise the caregiver to take the child to a health facility immediately.
Refer to a health facility.
Diarrhoea
No diarrhea treatment given
Continue Breastfeeding
Give breastmilk more frequently, ever hour, to fight sickness and prevent weight loss.
Give ORS if needed
Give ORS

Supply with 2 packets.
Instruct caregiver that after each loose stool to give at least 1/4 cup.
Always mix with treated, filtered or boiled water.
Advise caregiver to make fresh ORS each day.

Supply with 2 packets.
Instruct caregiver that after each loose stool to give at least 1/4 cup.
Always mix with treated, filtered or boiled water.

Supply with 2 packets.
Instruct caregiver that after each loose stool to give 1/2 cup - 1 cup.
Always mix with treated, filtered or boiled water.
Treat with Zinc

½ tab once a day mixed with breastmilk
For 10 days
Total of 5

½ tab once a day
For 10 days
Total of 5

1 tab once a day
For 10 days
Total of 10

Remind parent to continue breastfeeding.

Help caregiver give the first dose of Zinc now.

Remind caregiver to give the full course of medication to the child.
Help the caregiver give first drink of ORS and dose of Zinc now.
Help the caregiver give first drink of ORS now.

Advise caregiver to: Make fresh ORS each day. If a child is still on the breast, keep breastfeeding. Continue giving other clean drinks. Give extra food during diarrhoea and for 2 weeks after it stops.

Remind the caregiver to give the full course of medication to the child.
Refer to a health facility.
Advise caregiver to continue giving ORS on the way to a health facility.

1 tab
Twice a day

2.5ml of syrup

Every 6 hours

Help the caregiver give the first dose of ACT now.

Feeding the Sick Child

Give breastmilk at least every hour
No other liquids or food. Do not even give water.

Give breastmilk every hour to fight sickness and prevent weight loss.
No other liquids or food.

Continue breastfeeding.
Offer other liquids, such as porridge, soup, and natural fruit juices.
Give soft foods, offer small amounts of food frequently.
Actively encourage the child to eat as much as he/she is willing.
Speed recovery and growth with more and varied foods, especially extra snacks.

Give more liquids, such as porridge, soup, and natural fruit juices.
Give soft foods, offer small amounts of food frequently.
Actively encourage the child to eat as much as he/she is willing.
Speed recovery and growth with more and varied foods, especially extra snacks.
